name: Loot N Craft [BETA]
description:
CRAFTING RECIPES:
  • 5 common (grey) items -> 1 uncommon (green) item
  • 5 uncommon (green) items -> 1 rare (blue) item
  • 5 rare (blue) items -> 1 epic (purple) item
  • 5 epic (purple) items -> 1 legendary (orange) item
  • 2 broken swords (common) -> 1 regular sword (uncommon)
  • 5 milk (rare) -> 1 legendary item
HOW TO PLAY PUZZLE:

Press SPACE when the number in the center of the dial matches with the number at the top of the dial (this puzzle is all about timing). Navigate the rewards screen with arrow keys until you hit the end, then press the 'Continue' button.

HOW TO USE COLLECTION SCREEN:

Click an item to inspect it. Click on the inspection screen to close it. You can equip items with enchantments in the inspection screen. Items with enchantments have a special visual effect.

Hold the left mouse button on an item to enter selection mode. Click all other items you want to select. You can craft or sell in bulk (total price is shown on sell button).

You can buy more collection & equipment slots.

FEEDBACK:

Thank you for playing!
